com.tencent.soter.core

类 SoterCore

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tencent.soter.core.SoterCore
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ConstantsSoter, SoterErrCode

    public class SoterCore
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConstantsSoter, SoterErrCode
    The SOTER Core APIs for developer to handle keys and other basic stuff. Do not change this file because there're many magic codes in it.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明

      • 从接口继承的字段 com.tencent.soter.core.model.SoterErrCode

        ERR_ASK_GEN_FAILED, ERR_ASK_NOT_EXIST, ERR_AUTH_KEY_GEN_FAILED, ERR_OK, ERR_PARAMERROR, ERR_REMOVE_ASK, ERR_REMOVE_AUTH_KEY, ERR_SOTER_NOT_SUPPORTED, ERR_UNKNOWN

        另请参阅:

    • 构造器详细资料

      • SoterCore

        public SoterCore()

    • 方法详细资料

      • setUp

        public static void setUp()
        The prepare work before using SOTER. Be sure to call this method before SOTER operation

      • isNativeSupportSoter

        public static boolean isNativeSupportSoter()
        Check whether this device supports SOTER by checking native interfaces. Remind that you should check the server side as well, instead of trust the return value of this method only
        返回:
        Whether this device supports SOTER by it's native check result.

      • generateAppGlobalSecureKey

        public static SoterCoreResult generateAppGlobalSecureKey()
        Generate App Secure Key. Remind not to call it in UI thread
        返回:
        The result of generating process

      • removeAppGlobalSecureKey

        public static SoterCoreResult removeAppGlobalSecureKey()
        Delete the App Secure Key. Remind that once removed, this key can never be retrieved any more.
        返回:
        true if you delete the App Secure Key, false otherwise

      • hasAppGlobalSecureKey

        public static boolean hasAppGlobalSecureKey()
        Check if there's already a pair of App Secure Key of this application.
        返回:
        true if there's already App Secure Key

      • getAppGlobalSecureKeyModel

        public static SoterPubKeyModel getAppGlobalSecureKeyModel()
        To retrieve the App Secure Key model from device.
        返回:
        The App Secure Key model.

      • generateAuthKey

        public static SoterCoreResult generateAuthKey(java.lang.String authKeyName)
        Generate Auth Key. Remind not to call it in UI thread
        参数:
        authKeyName - The alias of the Auth Key to be generated. Keep in mind it should be unique in each business scene, or the key would be overwritten
        返回:
        The result of key generating process.

      • removeAuthKey

        public static SoterCoreResult removeAuthKey(java.lang.String authKeyName,
                                            boolean isAutoDeleteASK)
        Delete the Auth Key. Remind that once removed, this key can never be retrieved any more.
        参数:
        authKeyName - The alias of the key to be deleted
        isAutoDeleteASK - true if you want to remove the App Secure Key at the same time
        返回:
        true if the key deleting process is successful

      • hasAuthKey

        public static boolean hasAuthKey(java.lang.String authKeyName)
        If there's already a pair of auth key by the given key alias
        参数:
        authKeyName - The key alias to check
        返回:
        true if there's already a pair of auth key

      • isAuthKeyValid

        public static boolean isAuthKeyValid(java.lang.String authKeyName,
                                     boolean autoDelIfNotValid)
        Check if the Auth Key is valid or not. The check is necessary because from Android M, the Auth Key would be permanently invalid once user enrolled a new fingerprint in the device.
        参数:
        authKeyName - The alias of the auth key to check
        autoDelIfNotValid - If the auth key should be deleted when find it invalid
        返回:
        If the key is valid

      • getAuthKeyModel

        public static SoterPubKeyModel getAuthKeyModel(java.lang.String authKeyName)
        To retrieve the App Secure Key model from device.
        参数:
        authKeyName - he alias of the auth key
        返回:
        The public key model of the Auth Key

      • getAuthInitAndSign

        public static java.security.Signature getAuthInitAndSign(java.lang.String useKeyAlias)
        Prepare the Signature object before authenticating. You should keep the object for later use after user authenticated. More over, this method is used for checking whether the auth key is valid or not.
        参数:
        useKeyAlias - The Auth Key alias of which key you want to prepare
        返回:
        The prepared Signature. It would be null if the prepare process fails, or the Auth Key is already invalid.

      • convertFromBytesToSignatureResult

        public static SoterSignatureResult convertFromBytesToSignatureResult(byte[] origin)
        Convert the byte array got from Signature.sign() to SoterSignatureResult model.
        参数:
        origin - The return value of Signature.sign()
        返回:
        The signature model

      • isSupportFingerprint

        public static boolean isSupportFingerprint(android.content.Context context)
        Judge whether there's fingerprint sensor in this device,
        参数:
        context - The context
        返回:
        true if there's fingerprint sensor

      • isSystemHasFingerprint

        public static boolean isSystemHasFingerprint(android.content.Context context)
        Judge whether there's any fingerprint enrolled in this device
        参数:
        context - The context
        返回:
        true if there's fingerprint enrolled

      • isCurrentFingerprintFrozen

        public static boolean isCurrentFingerprintFrozen(android.content.Context context)
        Judge whether current fingerprint is frozen due to too many failure trials. If true, you should not use fingerprint for authentication in current session.
        返回:
        True if the fingerprint sensor is frozen now.

      • generateRemoteCheckRequestParam

        public static java.lang.String generateRemoteCheckRequestParam()
        The parameter represents this device software build. It is for remote SOTER support check use.
        返回:
        The parameter you should put in the request parameter
